events.text:
Hi Mom! Mr. Buendia allowed me to do the harvest all by myself this year.
I tought he would still be mad from the last time when I destroyed the whole paddy.
But this year he is having this back pains, and I have worked a lot in controlling my strength.
It's just like you said:
"Tomas, you are not a blunt, you are just a clumsy teenager...
 like every single teenager in the world"
Anyway I'm gotta hurry to finish, Mrs. Buendia is making enchiladas verdes for me as a reward.
Just like you used to do...
... I miss you mom.
